id.description: The unique identifier for the release

created_at.description: The date and time when the release was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the release was last updated

project_id.description: The identifier of the project the release belongs to

current_state.description: The current state of the release

url.description: The URL for accessing the release

labels.description: The labels associated with the release

accepted_at.description: The date and time when the release was accepted
